Hero.title: Hello, i am Maykel Arias Torres

About.title: About Me
description: Solid front-end knowledge of React, ES6+, HTML5, CSS3, Redux, Typescript, and Jest.
Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles, advanced CSS (CSS Modules, Emotion, Sass, Styled Components), and responsive design.
Backend experience using APIs Node.js/Express, Python/Django, Auth, Security, and RESTful.
Administration of relational and non-relational databases using MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL.
Positive attitude, strong work ethic, focus on results while focusing on high code quality and performance.
